Document.Focus: Cognitive behavioral therapy for back pain

Synonyms.Synonym: Chronic back pain - low - cognitive behavioral

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Cognitive behavioral therapy for back pain ?
QAPair.Answer: Cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) can help many people deal with chronic pain .
